definition: to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
to treat differently/another cup of tea
(coll.) to beat it/to take French leave
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
